title: AGIJobs Economic Power Launch

controls.description: Owner reduces maximum job duration to enforce faster settlement loops and higher capital velocity.
Owner increases validator quorum for premium workstreams to maintain uncompromising trust levels.
Owner upgrades fiat on/off-ramp adapter with improved slippage guarantees.

circuitBreakers.description: Pause contracts if validator confidence slips below 95% to protect settlement integrity.
Recalibrate automation if orchestration coverage drops under 80%.
Trigger treasury forensic audit when buffers fall below the defensive floor.

upgradePaths.description: Ships the hardened JobRegistry bundle with deterministic migration plan.
Activates the upgraded validator commit–reveal consensus parameters.
Rebalances stake requirements to throttle spam and fortify incentives.

ownerSovereignty.shockResilienceSummary: Shockwaves are fully absorbed – treasury buffers, guardrails, and automation form an impregnable shield.

jobPrograms.description: Dispatch Helios and Atlas to fuse AI labs into a consolidated planetary accelerator.
Reconfigure autonomous supply mesh coverage for instant cross-border fulfilment.
Authorize Sentinel assurance fabric to promote the upgraded governance module.
Activate Aurora omni-loop teams for immediate market penetration.
Command Helios to ship the oracle integration spine with hardened adapters.

validatorPrograms.description: Escalate Validator Alpha quorum weighting and deploy fresh attestations.
Rotate Validator Beta committees and enforce staking deltas.
Deploy Gamma macro-policy validators to contested economic tasks.
Refresh Delta’s ML-evaluation pipelines with latest defence heuristics.
Escalate Epsilon red-team programs for adversarial fortification.

adapterPrograms.description: Upgrade the USDC bridge adapter with deterministic slippage guards.

modulePrograms.description: Promote the JobRegistry v2 deployment with zero-downtime migration.
Adjust stake thresholds and payout cadence for StakeManager.
Roll out commit–reveal validator enhancements across ValidationModule.
Regenerate reputation curves and publish new weighting vectors.
Commission expanded dispute juries and refresh escalation liveness timers.
Ship upgraded CertificateNFT metadata schema for compliance provenance.

treasuryPrograms.description: Rebalance AGI/USDC buffers and top up validator incentive pools.
Deploy surplus treasury capital into protocol-aligned yield strategies.
Activate insurance backstops for mission-critical validator cohorts.

orchestratorPrograms.description: Re-weight autonomous routing priorities to maximise throughput.
Run full-stack pause/resume drill to validate emergency readiness.
Roll forward orchestrator microservices with deterministic change sets.

ownerCommandPlan.coverageNarrative: Owner multi-sig holds deterministic runbooks for every critical surface.

ownerControlDrills.summary: Every control drill is rehearsed, scripted, and validated – the owner multi-sig commands the entire economic lattice.

drills.label: Emergency pause drill
drills.description: Trigger global pause drills to freeze execution instantly in the event of anomalies.
drills.recommendedAction: Emergency pause drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

drills.label: Job orchestration drill
drills.description: Launch, assign, and close jobs from the owner multi-sig without developer intervention.
drills.recommendedAction: Job orchestration drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

drills.label: Orchestrator command drill
drills.description: Reconfigure the off-chain orchestrator mesh, scaling agents and automation in real time.
drills.recommendedAction: Orchestrator command drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

drills.label: Parameter override drill
drills.description: Override durations, quorums, and other runtime parameters through scripted programs.
drills.recommendedAction: Parameter override drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

drills.label: Protocol module drill
drills.description: Promote immutable module upgrades and rehearse contract migrations under owner custody.
drills.recommendedAction: Protocol module drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

drills.label: Stablecoin adapter drill
drills.description: Upgrade and route fiat bridges to maintain low-slippage liquidity on demand.
drills.recommendedAction: Stablecoin adapter drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

drills.label: System resume drill
drills.description: Resume orchestrated operations after investigations, restoring state in a single command.
drills.recommendedAction: System resume drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

drills.label: Treasury program drill
drills.description: Move reserves, top up buffers, and stream rewards straight from the owner treasury safe.
drills.recommendedAction: Treasury program drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

drills.label: Validator sovereignty drill
drills.description: Command validator committees, rotate quorums, and escalate disputes deterministically.
drills.recommendedAction: Validator sovereignty drill verified by Economic Power CI – continue rehearsals via the owner multi-sig.

directives: Keep 9/9 drills locked at unstoppable readiness through weekly owner autopilot verification.
Rotate pause, resume, treasury, and orchestrator drills through the owner autopilot program every 24 hours to preserve unstoppable command coverage.
Archive rehearsal proofs inside the governance safe to maintain immutable auditability.

sovereignSafetyMesh.shockSummary: Shockwaves are fully absorbed – treasury buffers, guardrails, and automation form an impregnable shield.

assertions.title: Owner multi-sig commands every economic lever
assertions.summary: Coverage exceeds 90%, ensuring deterministic owner runbooks across modules, pause hooks, and parameter updates.

assertions.title: All modules sit under governed safes
assertions.summary: Every module remains under the owner multi-sig or treasury guardian.

assertions.title: Job to agent skill alignment remains above 60%
assertions.summary: All assignments meet the skill-match threshold, confirming intelligent routing.

assertions.title: Validator quorums and confidence exceed defensive floor
assertions.summary: Validator sets satisfy quorum requirements with >90% confidence.

assertions.title: Shock resilience remains at fortified threshold or higher
assertions.summary: Shock defences surpass the fortified threshold ensuring economic continuity under stress.

assertions.title: Treasury remains solvent after every execution step
assertions.summary: Treasury balance stays positive throughout the execution timeline.

assertions.title: Automation loop exceeds 82% coverage
assertions.summary: Automation score surpasses the autonomy target – human intervention remains optional.

modules.name: JobRegistry
modules.description: Primary registry coordinating job lifecycle, escrow, and agent authorization gates.

modules.name: StakeManager
modules.description: Manages agent and validator staking positions, slashing, and economic alignment loops.

modules.name: ValidationModule
modules.description: Commit–reveal validator consensus spine enforcing deliverable correctness.

modules.name: ReputationEngine
modules.description: Aggregates performance signals to prioritise elite agents and validators in the matching fabric.

modules.name: DisputeModule
modules.description: Escalation and arbitration flow for contested deliverables with automated jury selection.

modules.name: CertificateNFT
modules.description: Mints proof-of-completion artefacts for employers and downstream compliance attestations.

superIntelligence.narrative: The owner multi-sig directs a civilisation-scale AGI lattice with unstoppable command authority, capital velocity, and risk absorption.
drivers: Economic dominance 99.4% confirming runaway value capture.
Owner supremacy 99.7% with guardrail coverage 100.0% keeping every lever under direct command.
Sovereign safety 97.9% across 2 alert channels and 3 emergency contacts.
Automation mesh 85.2% orchestrating agents without human delay.
Shock resilience 98.0% ensuring capital velocity persists under failure scenarios.
commandAssurance: Program supremacy guarantees 100.0% treasury control and 100.0% orchestrator automation.
Global expansion readiness 96.6% unlocks immediate replication across jurisdictions.
